{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Encore |model=ENHWI-1AN42 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin=B006VKB7WS |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=06/23/2011 |manuf_country=China |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=YZ500000006 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8196C |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L1635DM |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=ISSI |ram1_model=IS42S16800B-6TL |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8188CE |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=schematics |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=default |default_ssid_regex=^default$ |default_ip=192.168.10.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Wireless N150 Router}}, 2dBi [http://www.encore-usa.com/us/product/ENHWI-1AN42 Product page] {{SupportPage|vendor=Encore|model=ENHWI-1AN42}}
[http://file.encore-usa.com/misc/product/ENHWI-2AN4x/ENHWI-1AN4x_2AN4x_Router_UM_20110225-1.pdf User Manual] Schematics show the device with an RTL8192CE, but this single-stream device is assumed to use a RTL8188CE. == Images == File:ENHWI-1AN42_pdt_main.jpg|a shot of the ENHWI-1AN42 from Encore's website [[Has images::external| ]]
